titleStmt.title: The necessity of some nearer conjunction and correspondency amongst evangelicall Protestants, for the advancement of the nationall cause, and bringing to passe the effect of the covenant.
titleStmt.author: Hartlib, Samuel, d. 1662.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "By Samuel Hartlib"; "Nouemb: 9th".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
